title: Lawyer Finder
description: Lawyer Finder is a web platform designed to help users easily find lawyers for different legal needs. The platform provides a user-friendly interface to search for lawyers based on various criteria, such as legal practice areas, expertise, and user reviews.
features: User can post for legal solution, Feedback for attorney, Connect with attorney, Apply for intern post.
Attorney can update profile and fee structure, Write blogs and hire intern.
Admin can manage blogs, users, attorney and give support to users for fulfil case solution.

title: House Hunter
description: House Hunter is a delightful platform that simplifies the house rental process. It serves as a connecting bridge between house owners, who wish to rent out their properties, and house renters, who are seeking their dream homes.
features: Dark Mood
Custom authentication system with MongoDB and JWT
MongoDB CRUD operations for individual users
Different dashboard route for house renter and house owner with full functionality

title: String
description: A Musical institution web platform designed to connect newbie musical soul and experts. Where user can simply find all musical courses and purchase it from instructors. The instructors can upload courses for users.
features: Dark Mood
Authentication System
MongoDB CRUD operations for individual users
Different dashboard route for Students, Instructors and Admin with full functionality
Stripe payment method integration

title: Mighty Marvelous
description: This is a simple MERN-stack Toy Marketplace website
features: Authentication System
MongoDB CRUD operations for individual users
Different dashboard route for seller

title: Hire Sphere
